article_title: West Point Police Investigating Deadly Shooting
article_text:
WEST POINT, Miss. (WCBI) — West Point police are investigating a deadly shooting.

Law enforcement confirmed with WCBI that one person was shot and killed at a local apartment complex on North Forest Street just before 7 p.m., Friday.

West Point Police Chief Tim Brinkley says the suspect is not in custody. His investigators are working the case.

WCBI is following this story, and will bring you more information as it becomes available.

og.description: West Point police are investigating a Friday night shooting.
